lead_paragraph: For the Skinner family, the official opening to the shrimping season was as slow as expected. Gary Skinner had to purchase shrimp from Florida and his sons, who do the fishing for the store, hope the season turns around later this month.
snippet: For the Skinner family, the official opening to the shrimping season was as slow as expected. Gary Skinner had to purchase shrimp from Florida and his sons, who do the fishing for the store, hope the season turns around later this month.

headline.main: Alabama Shrimping Opens Late and Starts Slow
